responses: Hi there, what can I do for you?
Hi there, how can I help?
See you later, thanks for visiting

Navsanjeevan Social Trust strives to build an equitable and egalitarian society. They aim to alleviate poverty by providing better, sustainable livelihood opportunities for the underprivileged and empowering the next generation with Skill Education. They aim to build a healthy, vibrant, and dynamic society by promoting skill development, career guidance, technical education, women empowerment, community development, and agriculture development.

Why did the hipster burn his mouth? He drank the coffee before it was cool.
What did the buffalo say when his son left for college? Bison.
